Breadcrumbs are a quest item in the Freeing Pirate Pete subquest of the Recipe for Disaster quest. They are made by using a knife on a loaf of bread, requiring starting the quest, and used as an ingredient to make a raw fishcake.

Breadcrumbs are also used as payment to a bellshroom plant in order to enter and exit a secluded area in the Tar Swamp on Fossil Island.

[[File:Breadcrumbs detail.png|left|80px]]
'''Breadcrumbs''' are a [[quest item]] in the [[Freeing Pirate Pete]] subquest of the [[Recipe for Disaster]] [[quest]]. They are made by using a [[knife]] on a loaf of [[bread]], requiring starting the quest, and used as an ingredient to make a [[raw fishcake]].

Breadcrumbs are also used as payment to a [[bellshroom]] plant in order to enter and exit a secluded area in the [[Tar Swamp]] on [[Fossil Island]].
